text:
@JasonSCampbell So, Gov Cuomo, you had nothing to do with the murders of the Nursing Home occupants. Why did you send 5 body bags with re-admitted Covid patients? Why is your name on the March 25th document requiring the acceptance of these individuals? Just asking.
